name: Galactic Destroyer
description:
INSTRUCTIONS: 

•Left Click to launch the ball,

•Destroy all the bricks

• have fun! :)

INTRODUCTION:

This is the very first game that I created on my own, the game is designed to be sort of a rage/adventure game using a simple concept of block breaking (based on the original "Arkanoid 1986").  I am a student learning to become a game developer in the future so this is my very first crack at a simple concept with some extra features that will make the game interesting and fun!

FEATURES:

The game is simple, break blocks to progress level by level. As of right now (in development) there are a total 20+ levels with some unique adventure/ game mechanic elements scattered throughout the game (that I thought would be amazing to have!). The rage elements of the game are designed to not be considered a "Break your keyboard" level of rage but rather a "Mild inconvenience" level of rage. I wanted to add a feeling of horror through visual and audio representations since the game is based in a space-like environment and as we know, space can be very frighting packed with many unknowns.

FUTURE:

I have set up some visual representations of a story that I would like to tell  (using the breakable blocks) and have also thought of some extra/ returning mechanics that I would like to add to the game but that is entirely based on your opinion. Yes your opinion means a lot to me and I would like to make whatever I create better then ever so please tell me in the comments what you think about this game. From the bottom of my heart I thank you for giving it your time and I sincerely hope you guys enjoy what I create, now and in the future!

Don't forget to smile :)

Special thanks to freesound.org, bensound.com and Youtuber Annex for providing the music and sound effects!
